body.name: Dazmers Building Sticks for Kids - Straws and Connectors Builders Set - STEM Construction Building Toys - Educational Interlocking Sticks - Connecting Tubes - Building Straws Activities (800 Pieces)

features: Our 800 pieces of gigantic straw and connector set to build endless creations! let your imagination loose and build houses, cars, planes and robots with the flexible straws, connectors and clips!
It offers a unique opportunity for children to develop their imagination, construction, and problem-solving abilities. They'll have fun while broadening their understanding and cognitive skills.
This set is ideal for the classroom, offering early experiences in engineering, construction, critical thinking, reasoning, mathematics, science, and simple mechanics.
Keep your child's creations safe and organized with our sturdy storage box, complete with an easy-clip lid and carry handle for convenient storage at home or while traveling.
It provides a unique balance of education and entertainment. Children will learn important skills and concepts while having fun and using their imaginations to build and create.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Helps improve creativity and problem-solving skills Understanding with special straws and connectors Play and learn!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great!
reviews.reviewText: I use these in my classroom for as a special education teacher k-5. They work really well as a calming/sensory aide for my students. I have also used them as SEL lesson in teamwork. They straws are pretty durable, even when bent. I love that my students are able to use their imaginations and be creative with these. I will warn that what they build may take up quite a bit of room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for my son
reviews.reviewText: My son bought these for himself with some Christmas Monet he received. He has some at school and enjoys building with them.They arrived quickly but the plastic storage container was crack on the bottom. I had to put some tape over it because the broken part is sharp.But the items inside the storage box were not damaged.The first thing he wanted to do was build a very tall tower to reach the ceiling. We have really high ceilings but with some help he was able to build it up super high.He has also built a fort with them.I would recommend this building toy. It’s keeps kids busy and off the electronics. ; )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Straws & Connectors Building set to have at my house for my grandson. He will be 8 in a couple of weeks. We had a great time building. They are easy to assemble & durable& you can have a lot of creative fun with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of pieces!
reviews.reviewText: This item comes full!! They are a little stiff but my 3rd graders can do it. Younger kids might struggle to make pieces fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing! Must have for classroom
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for 6th graders and they actually liked it. They tried building a fort. Great for practicing team work!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect toy to keep little kids occupied
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome toy! I received it a few days ago and it keeps my 3 and 5 year old very busy. It's great quality as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great creative toy
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my 1st and 2nd grade classroom. My students love them and I do too. These give endless creative possibilities and help teach engineering and design.Only problem is it impossible to place all items back into storage box they come in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: My son was so excited about these! He had played with them in our children's church and so I knew he would like them. Great value. Fun & simple toy that keeps my son entertained and using his imagination for hours. :)
